heading: Welcome to ORBI
paragraph: Greetings and welcome to ORBI: Orbital Research & Beyond Innovations! We are a dynamic, student-led research group at NERIST, dedicated to shaping the future of space technology. Our work orbits at the intersection of Aerospace Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, and Robotics. Through rigorous interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to pushing beyond conventional thinking, we develop cutting-edge solutions to real-world challenges. We invite you to explore our projects, discover our research, and learn how you can be a part of our exciting journey to the frontiers of science and technology.
